data.text: Ani utuun iddoo itti isa argadhu beekee,
Silaa dhimma koo fuula isaa duratti dhiʼeeffadhee
Waan inni naa deebisu nan beekan ture;
Inni humna isaa guddaa sanaan anaan mormaa?
Namni qajeelaan achuma fuula isaa duratti dhimma isaa ni dhiʼeeffata;
“Garuu yoo ani gara baʼa biiftuu deeme, inni achi hin jiru;
Yommuu inni kaabatti hojii irra jirutti ani isa hin argu;
Inni garuu karaa ani baʼu ni beeka;
Miilli koo tarkaanfii isaatti dhiʼaatee duukaa buʼeera;
Ani ajaja afaan isaa irraa hin fagaanne;
“Inni garuu of dandaʼee kophaa isaa dhaabata;
Inni waan natti mure ni raawwata;
Wanni ani fuula isaa duratti naʼuufis kanuma;
